channel.title: Changing chat?
channel.description: Hey just wanted to ask if its possible to make it so where ppl talk its just like normal but if owners talk the letters are blue and chat box is blue .. also another question i want to add is if i can add my own mini games .. my server doesnt have castle wars i wanted to know if i can add it onto mine or do i need another source? plz reply thx

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Teak”)) {
c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[Global Mod]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "

}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Shadow”)) {

+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

item.title: Changing chat?
item.dc:creator: @xxbanditxx xxbanditxx
item.description:
@xxbanditxx wrote:

[quote=“go armand, post:2, topic:406559”]both of these are possible
the first is deffinantely easier then the last.
what source?
mine is a 562 i think and this is my code…

[code=text]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0){
							c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
								
						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
}[/code]

the (shad) and (col) are the different colour types.

and the img is the mod crowns…
there you go, hope i helped[/quote]
thats under commands right? when i go under commands and find yell this is mine.
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {

This is the sensor for the yell command

“.com”, “.net”, “.org”, “no-ip”, "", “is gay”, "**",
“crap”, “rubbish”, “. com”, “. serve”, “. no-ip”, “. net”, “. biz”};
for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
return;
}
}/
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]

do i jst replace that with urs?

item.title: Changing chat?
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“go armand, post:2, topic:406559”]both of these are possible
the first is deffinantely easier then the last.
what source?
mine is a 562 i think and this is my code…

[code=text]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0){
							c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
								
						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
}[/code]

the (shad) and (col) are the different colour types.

and the img is the mod crowns…
there you go, hope i helped[/quote]
That looks more like a 317 pi to me. At OP, you can use a command like his for yell, but for regular chat that would be client sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing chat?
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

both of these are possible
the first is deffinantely easier then the last.
what source?
mine is a 562 i think and this is my code…

[code=text]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0){
							c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
								
						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
}[/code]

the (shad) and (col) are the different colour types.

and the img is the mod crowns…
there you go, hope i helped

Read full topic
